txt.en: 'You must be weary from your efforts and long travels, [placeholder]. Loth as I would be to see you leave, I feel obligated to tell you that there is a dwarf-keep not far from here that offers far more by way of comforts than this sad little camp-fire ever could.\n\n'Othrikar is the name the dwarves have given it. They are friendly, as dwarves go. If you wish to find a more habitable place to stay, it is a very short distance to the north-east, a stone dwelling nestled into the hills.'
Find the dwarf keep of Othrikar
'Well met, traveller! Welcome to Othrikar. You may find rest here, or work, if it suits you. What do you say to that?'
Orthonn has directed you to Othrikar, the nearest outpost that would welcome a weary traveller.
Othrikar can be found to the north-east of Orthonn's camp, in the northern hills of the Kingsfell.\n\nYou should seek the dwarf fortress of Othrikar.
